Blackstorm:

Blackstorm nodded and she tottered, following Maxima.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 4/28/03 7:12:14 PM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > In fact she was noticing that she was getting weak... She didn't 
> > realized until now that using her energy balls did that she was 
> > getting weak... and that didn't like her.
> > 
> > BLackstorm aimed and fired two feather missiles
> > 
> > 
> 
> Maxima was somewhat caught off guard. Considering, she would have 
taken this 
> as an actual threat & attack. 
> 
> She leapt back, grabbing her pistol & shot at the 2 feather 
missiles, 
> destroying them. She then glared at Blackstorm. "Show time is 
over. 
> Recharge." she motioned to the door. "We shall continue later."
